title: bronze life
body: the only time i have fun in this game is when i play with people that are diamond or above and get on their smurfs and boost me out of bronze, like playing in bronze weather it be normals or ranked is just so unbearable when you have a bot lane that is 0/12 with 35cs both support and adc at 9mins in and blame everyone else for what they have done, when instead i can play with friends that know i don't belong but have seen this shit and thinks is bullshit that some players have to deal with this when they clearly don't belong there. how are you supposed to even want to try and play this game when wherever you go you are killed instantly or one shot? how is that fun for anyone? oh right then you must endure the fact you still have 11mins till you can /ff but oh how your team decides to troll you and you must suffer till defeat lasting 45mins of just non-stop alli has been slain announcements. then if you get so sick of it you just leave you get a leaver buster. yes roit when i play games i want to feel annoyed and distressed , i want to get so annoyed that i'm literally afk in the jungle outside smoking a blunt cause that's more fun then dying over and over and watching 4 teammates argue in all chat. i support boosting now after what i've had to endure these past few weeks. some people just don't belong in bronze.

replies.body:
Your friends raising your rank is what is making your games without them so miserable. They are pulling you out of the rank you belong. So when you aren't with your friends you are playing with people that greatly out match you.

If you want your teams to stop getting stomped you need to let yourself fall to where you belong.

> [{quoted}](name=SmokedAlmonds,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GTtyl5mE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-26T10:50:58.617+0000)
>
> Your friends raising your rank is what is making your games without them so miserable. They are pulling you out of the rank you belong. So when you aren't with your friends you are playing with people that greatly out match you.
> 
> If you want your teams to stop getting stomped you need to let yourself fall to where you belong.

i get what you're saying here,  but when i play with them they aren't carrying me, it's just they aren't stupid. actually what i think it is, is that we can communicate over skype and voice comms just works better imo. and no when i play solo q on my own i do really well. literally has nothing to do with me, i'm 100% sure of it. how is it my fault, when you have a bot lane that dies cause their support made a bad play then decides that's enough to tilt them and you try your best to camp their lane but they are just to caught up with arguing with the support that they can't even play thus it turning into a 3v5 or 4v5 and sometimes you can't win all those. 

also i was tilted when i made this post and i realized i only had 3 bad games recently like this and it was probably due to the time of day, as it was 3am to 5am. when i played this morning i found the people i matched with were not sole idots who tilt off one bad play

but that's not fair when you are new to the game and still are learning and the season before placed bronze cause you were so noob and didn't know what you are doing and it say it evaluates you past on the season before thus meaning i was bronze 4 last season and now i'm bronze 2, but like it's not fair when you play placements and go 8-2 in them and get placed in bronze still. there is no reason i am here. i play higher than bronze cause i play with diamond and golds and some plats and can win lane/jungle just fine. like the system needs another placement review that is more fair and not biased from the season prior

> [{quoted}](name=dadimplayingrn,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GTtyl5mE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-26T10:34:37.614+0000)
>
> but that's not fair when you are new to the game and still are learning and the season before placed bronze cause you were so noob and didn't know what you are doing and it say it evaluates you past on the season before thus meaning i was bronze 4 last season and now i'm bronze 2, but like it's not fair when you play placements and go 8-2 in them and get placed in bronze still. there is no reason i am here. i play higher than bronze cause i play with diamond and golds and some plats and can win lane/jungle just fine. like the system needs another placement review that is more fair and not biased from the season prior

It doesn't just place based on your placement wins. It places based on your play. I'm sorry, bro, you are getting carried by your friends.

> [{quoted}](name=EvilDustMan,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GTtyl5mE,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-06-26T10:36:13.257+0000)
>
> It doesn't just place based on your placement wins. It places based on your play. I'm sorry, bro, you are getting carried by your friends.

i did placements on my own and did fine. i started playing with my friends after a few weeks, of trying to play solo q or whatever people call it now, and just having some bad results. but when i duo with my friends i get the people that i had in my ranked placements. facing people that actually are playing to win and not playing for troll reasons or whatever some people in bronze play for.. i seriously feel like some of you are just posting things you think i've said rather than reading what i'm actually saying here.
Bronze is actually pretty easy to get out of.

> [{quoted}](name=fhtrg7,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GTtyl5mE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-06-26T16:22:39.198+0000)
>
> Bronze is actually pretty easy to get out of.

Agree I found it super easy to climb once I didnt have my friend around, it became frustating a bit losing every game (support main) but then I noticed if I took charge and help lead my team (if they listened) and made suggestions other then assh*le comments like "You suck." etc etc. I found I could climb much easier and have less toxicity.

> [{quoted}](name=DisHonorUrFamiry,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GTtyl5mE,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-06-26T17:32:33.809+0000)
>
> Agree I found it super easy to climb once I didnt have my friend around, it became frustating a bit losing every game (support main) but then I noticed if I took charge and help lead my team (if they listened) and made suggestions other then assh*le comments like "You suck." etc etc. I found I could climb much easier and have less toxicity.

see but i'm not trying to be frustrated while playing this game, i want the people to know if i land a skill shot say with thresh q, that my team will follow up and not just stand there looking around. yes it's annoying when you play with people that "have to be the best and carry every game or they aren't winning" but you can't get people to always listen to you.  when i play with friends i enjoy the game, get a real matchup that is trying to win and even when they die 4 times i don't see all chat blowing up. when i play with friends the chat is sooo nice to talk to in all chat that by  the end of the game gg's and good conversations are happening. if i didn't belong in this elo with my friends i would be constantly feeding and thus making them not want to play with me. but when i play support i know what to do, build, and where to ward. i never said elo hell existed just for the record..

> [{quoted}](name=dadimplayingrn,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GTtyl5mE,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-06-26T19:16:06.867+0000)
>
> see but i'm not trying to be frustrated while playing this game, i want the people to know if i land a skill shot say with thresh q, that my team will follow up and not just stand there looking around. yes it's annoying when you play with people that "have to be the best and carry every game or they aren't winning" but you can't get people to always listen to you.  when i play with friends i enjoy the game, get a real matchup that is trying to win and even when they die 4 times i don't see all chat blowing up. when i play with friends the chat is sooo nice to talk to in all chat that by  the end of the game gg's and good conversations are happening. if i didn't belong in this elo with my friends i would be constantly feeding and thus making them not want to play with me. but when i play support i know what to do, build, and where to ward. i never said elo hell existed just for the record..

That's the thing I never said it was exactly elo hell. If you want to be technical with that then every rank would be elo hell in that case. 
Its also not what you dont know what to build or anything its just how people dont listen all the time is what I was saying. Normally how I say it is like "Hey ____ can you try following up more often on my skill shots? We might have an easier time getting this down if you work off the plays I try to make." Cause let's face it, everyone can make plays but supports do make some pretty amazing plays even in bronze. Just like how some Lee Sin can make amazing plays in bronze and do awesome but it just mostly comes down to their team and trying to convince them not to throw.

It is if you don't belong in Bronze.

That's the main issue most of them face.

> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GTtyl5mE,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2016-06-26T19:13:36.155+0000)
>
> It is if you don't belong in Bronze.
> 
> That's the main issue most of them face.

No, all you need it a good attitude, focus on csing and harassing, try your best to not die, and do your job every teamfight

no one blames anyone, tell them at the start to play safe and just dont die, and we will win. theirs no such thing as elo hell. as ive gone from B1 to B5. just to prove theirs no elo hell. i got silver today. it took about 4 weeks (work 3rd shift) 

theirs no such thing as elo hell. your just bad. and thats the honest truth. you must carry yourself. and not rely on them to carry you.

> [{quoted}](name=The 1st Angel,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GTtyl5mE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-06-26T13:04:08.172+0000)
>
> no one blames anyone, tell them at the start to play safe and just dont die, and we will win. theirs no such thing as elo hell. as ive gone from B1 to B5. just to prove theirs no elo hell. i got silver today. it took about 4 weeks (work 3rd shift) 
> 
> theirs no such thing as elo hell. your just bad. and thats the honest truth. you must carry yourself. and not rely on them to carry you.


saying no one blames anyone is like saying the time noon is not most referred to as lunch time.... yes you can communicate with people on WHAT not to do. but it's up to them what they solely choose to do. i never said elo hell existed... >.>.. congrats on from getting those ranked, but that proves literally nothing. 4 weeks? so a month? you didn't read my post clearly. re-read it and you might get the point. but a typical one tracked mind thinking i'm just complaining about elo hell when never such was brought up till you talked about, and if i'm bad than i should have no friends that would want to play with when i can easily play with them and sometimes even carry them

your actually right, i didnt read any of it honestly. it says bronze life. so i assume elo hell, just mute everyone and do smart pings, a month is actually a decent time since i only played 2 games a day, cause i just got bored if i did more.

Love, if you get placed in: Bronze, Silver, Gold....etc. You are there for a reason. The system evaluates what tier to put you in, depending on you're level of play. Then you have to either accept the attitude of the people you are with or leave ranked or (god help you) carry hard. Well you could just make a team and get boosted up. Up to you. ^_^
